availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Rueben L. Ireland (Gallatin County, Kentucky, county and circuit court clerk)

body.p: Gallatin County, Kentucky, county and circuit court clerk. Kentucky native. Son of James Beatty Ireland and Sarah Lancaster Ireland. Married to Emily D. Moore Ireland. Father of Robinson Ireland. Resident in Gallatin County, Kentucky, in 1850. Clerk in Gallatin County in 1860. Gallatin County Court Clerk from 1862 to 1865. Gallatin Circuit Court Clerk in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Gallatin County, p. 186A.
